summary: ALARMS WENT OFF, LOSS OF INSTRUMENT PANEL, COMPLETE LOSS OF TRANSMISSION POWER AND ENGINE CUT OUT. "TRANSMISSION FAULT, SERVICE TRANSMISSION NOW" WAS THE MESSAGE RECEIVED.  HAD VEHICLE TOWED TO FORD SERVICE CENTER.  ON AUGUST 17, 2014 AT 60  MILES AN HOUR IT HAPPENED AGAIN. HAVE HAD CAR TOWED TO SERVICE CENTER AGAIN.  *TR
